name: puertollano, the game
description:
Do you dare to reach the end?. A new concept of game to enjoy with more than 36 scenarios.

We must pass through the middle of different structures (carbon columns, streetlights, pinetrees, industrial chimneys, birds murderers) and keep the paper airplane in the air, crossing the iconic scenes of the city of Puertollano and all with different weather ( day, night, shower, hail, rain, fog, snow, wind, sandstorm, ... ).

puertollano, the game is an arcade game.

Features:

- It's very easy to play.

- Touch screen to raise the paper airplane.

- Funny with scenarios and realistic graphics.

- Visual effects ( day, night, shower, hail, rain, fog, snow, wind, sandstorm, ... ).

- Catchy music and original sound.
